name: Affordable Place for your stay!
description:
My place is close to the Red Line T station (walking distance) and the guests also have access to the MBTA bus line. Youâ€™ll love my place because of the location; it is close to JFK/UMASS & JFK Library. My place is good for solo adventurers and business travelers and the bedroom comes with a "Comfortable Airbed" as shown in the pictures.

The space
This Private Room comes with a "Comfortable Airbed", Closet, Lamp, Computer Desk & Chair and AC to keep unit nice and cool all summer long. In addition, All common areas are shared w/ students and/or professionals.

Guest access
Guest has access to all common areas.

Other things to note
1) Please state your "Full Name" and the "Purpose of your Stay" when making your inquiry.
2) Area is safe
3) There is also "Free Street Parking" 24 hours, No Resident Permit required.
NO Parking (between 12 pm-4 pm) on Street Cleaning Day, on the 3rd Wednesday and Thursday
